committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment

official_title: To amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to clarify the power of State and local governments to regulate the disposal of radioactive material that is not other wise regulated by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission.
short_title: Low-Level Radioactive Waste Environmental and Health Protection Act of 1990

summary.text: Low-Level Radioactive Waste Environmental and Health Protection Act of 1990 - Amends the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to declare that the States and their political subdivisions retain the power to regulate disposal of radioactive material that is not regulated by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission because of the concentration or quantity of radionuclides.

titles.title: Low-Level Radioactive Waste Environmental and Health Protection Act of 1990

To amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to clarify the power of State and local governments to regulate the disposal of radioactive material that is not other wise regulated by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission.
